definition: a signal that temporarily stops the execution of a program so that another procedure can be carried out, to terminate
details:
noun
- a signal that temporarily stops the execution of a program so that another procedure can be carried out
verb
- to terminate
= example: to terminate
= synonyms: axe, ax
- destroy the peace or tranquility of
= example: destroy the peace or tranquility of
= synonyms: disturb
- interfere in someone else's activity
= example: interfere in someone else's activity
= synonyms: disrupt
- make a break in
= example: make a break in
= synonyms: cut off
